settings.free_shipping_text: FREE USA SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $100+ & EASY 30-DAY RETURNS

settings.title: Popup
settings.content: Shop Now. Pay Later w/ ShopPay.

settings.title: We’re reinventing vintage classic baby clothing with organic & sustainable materials to last.
MADE FOR YOUR BABY & PLANET
settings.content: We believe sustainable fashion is our future. Not just for the safety of our babies, but for our entire planet.

settings.quote: "I got a sleeper for a friend as a gift, along with some other Noble goodies, and it got tons of 'oohs' and 'ahs'. I always use Noble for baby showers because the quality is so nice and the beautiful gift wrapping makes the whole package extra special."- Frey

"The Noble Organic Waffle Sleeper is great - I got the size 4y for my 4 year old and it has a bit of room for her to grow into it which I really appreciate. It is soft, cozy and I have to admit, we sometimes stay the entire day dressed in it. Thank you Noble for your prompt delivery and beautiful children's clothes!"- Lili

"We love Noble. I’ve been buying from Jen for 2.5 years now for and have never been disappointed, every piece in her shop is chosen with love for her customers. So happy with everything we have purchased."- Nina H.

settings.content: RECEIVE 10% OFF YOUR FIRST PURCHASE

settings.title: Contact us

settings.title: Noble Rewards
settings.content: Our community is super special to us; you’re why we do this. Our rewards program is where we get to spoil you back. Signing up takes seconds & you’ll start to earn points when you shop to save on your next Noble purchase.

settings.title: How to Earn Points
settings.content:
Give a friend $10 off their first purchase and earn 1,000 points if they spend over $30 to redeem $10 off your next order.
Earn $10 for every referral you make.

settings.banner_text: Welcome to Noblesharing. Mail in your used Noble threads for store credit or search for that exclusive piece that is no longer in stock. Our goal is to build a community centered around sustainability and accessibility, bringing people together.

settings.subheading: BEST-SELLING UTILITY SUIT & UTILITY DRESS FOR ADULTS
